*.unitypackage
*.csproj
*.sln
*.user
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
.vscode/
.idea/
.vs/

# Rider
*.sln.iml

# Unity Cache ve Yerel Ayarlar
UserSettings/
*.tmproj
*.userprefs

# Sisteme özgü dosyalar
.DS_Store
*.swp
*.lock
*.tmp
*.bak
*.orig
*.log
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db
Desktop.ini

# Gömülü Versiyon Kontrol Sistemleri
*.git
*.hg
*.svn

# Unity Collaborate
.collabignore
.collab/

# Unity Cloud Build
.cloud/

# Auto-generated JetBrains Rider files
.idea/
*.sln.iml

# VS Code
.vscode/
.history/
